attributes.action: stop persecution Ukrainian human right defender Alexander Feldman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to draw your attention at the fact that Kharkiv AVEC concern owned by leader of Jewish Community in Ukraine, human rights defender Alexander Feldman, suffers from economical repressions. His 
business is being attacked for Feldman’s being a supporter of  human rights programs. By means of pre-conceived revisions and repressions Kharkiv’s authorities endeavor to establish a tendency of economical pursues of opponents in Ukraine. We appeal to the Prime Minister to take measures concerning a  support of the human right defender Alexander Feldman in Ukraine.
